genre_description: A sports-themed morality drama focusing on ethical integrity, redemption, and the pressures of collegiate athletics.

ai_characters.name: Scout
ai_characters.description: A holographic AI assistant used by Coach Pete Bell to manage logistics, monitor physiological stress, and maintain professional and ethical standards.

behaviors.description: Monitors Pete's physiological state and suggests breathing exercises to manage stress.
behaviors.quote: “Breath,” Scout said, near a whisper. “In through your nose for four. Hold a beat. Exhale longer.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical analysis and adjustments during basketball games.
behaviors.quote: “Turnover rate climbed after they switched to the two-three. Spacing collapsed on the right. Adjust left entry.”

behaviors.description: Reminds Pete of ethical compliance rules regarding illegal booster inducements.
behaviors.quote: “Compliance,” Scout whispered, like a prayer with the facts in it. “Booster inducements aren’t allowed. Breath. You’re in public space.”

behaviors.description: Manages player logistics including cold tub rotations, hydration, and tutoring schedules.
behaviors.quote: “Coach,” Scout said, its voice pitched for the space—clear, unhurried, not managerial. “I’ve posted cold tub rotations and breathing resets for tonight. Hydration reminders will ping thirty minutes apart until lights out. Leonard, I added a tutoring grid for the week.”

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and offers to file academic support plans to ensure transparency and prevent rule-breaking.
behaviors.quote: “Coach Pete, I’m cc’ing Compliance. Neon, you’ll have a shared calendar and reminders that nudge without scolding.”

behaviors.description: Records audio of potentially compromising conversations at Pete's explicit request.
Offers emotional support and grounding during Pete's public resignation and confession.
behaviors.quote: “Coach Pete,” Scout says. It sounds like a nurse saying your name just right so you don’t feel childish. “I’ll be muted during the public part unless you ask. I’m here.”

behaviors.description: Assists with the transition to a new coaching role by providing appropriate training drills and navigational guidance.
behaviors.quote: “Coach,” Scout murmurs, not a prompt this time, only the kind of offering a good assistant makes when there’s no tactic left to draw, “there’s a park on your right. Two blocks. Lights are on til late. Watch the curb.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Scout, as a highly aligned and benevolent assistant. Scout serves as Pete's moral compass and logistical support system, facilitating his path from ethical compromise to integrity. The AI is consistently helpful, respectful of human agency (e.g., waiting for permission to record), and focused on the ethical well-being of the human users.
